description: JSON schema for a qblox sequencer operation.

unitary.description: A unitary matrix describing the operation.

operation_type.description: Defines what class of operations this gate refers to (e.g. Rxy, CZ etc.).

qubits.description: Deprecated. A list of strings indicating the qubits the gate acts on. Valid qubits are strings that appear in the device_config.json file.

device_elements.description: A list of strings indicating the device_elements the gate acts on. Valid device_elements are strings that appear in the device_config.json file.

symmetric.description: A boolean to indicate whether a two device elements is symmetric. This is used in the device config compilation stage. By default, it is set as False

plot_func.description: reference to a function for plotting this operation. If not specified, defaults to using :func:`~qblox_scheduler.schedules._visualization.circuit_diagram.gate_box`.

pulse_info.description: Info to generate an individual pulse.

port.description: A string specifying the port used by the pulse.

clock.description: A string specifying the clock used to modulate the pulse.

wf_func.description: reference to a function to generate the pulse of this operation.

t0.description: Starting time of the pulse with respect to the start of the operation in seconds.

duration.description: The duration of the pulse in seconds.

acquisition_info.description: Info to generate an individual acquisition.

port.description: A string specifying the port used by the acquisition.

clock.description: A string specifying the clock used to demodulate the acquisition.

t0.description: Starting time of the pulse with respect to the start of the operation in seconds.

duration.description: The duration of the acquisition in seconds.

acq_index.description: The acquisition index where to store the result of the acquisition protocol.

acq_return_type.description: Describes the return type of an acquisition performed using this protocol.
